name: GuruHotel
long_description:
GuruHotel is the Shopify for the hotel industry. Our platform lets independent hotels quickly create modern, high-converting websites, accept direct bookings without relying on OTAs, and increase revenue by up to 30%.

Hotels can launch in minutes with built-in payments, analytics, and AI tools that handle pricing, guest messaging, and upselling. Weâ€™ve combined decades of experience building products for travel and hospitality to give small and mid-size properties the same digital capabilities as the big brands, without switching their PMS.
